text: A person may make a transfer by irrevocable gift to, or the irrevocable exercise of a power of appointment in favor of, a custodian for the benefit of a minor pursuant to section 21-309.
historical:

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-87, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 21-301.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 4 of the Uniform Transfers to Minors Act. See 8B Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
